text: I find technology to be an essential part of my daily life.
I feel comfortable using new technologies and gadgets.
I believe emerging technologies have the potential to greatly impact society.
I am concerned about the security and privacy risks associated with technology.
I believe technology has improved my overall productivity and efficiency.
I enjoy exploring and learning about new technological advancements.
I am open to adopting new technologies as soon as they are released.
I believe technology has positively impacted communication and connectivity.
I think technology has made our lives more convenient.
I trust the security measures put in place by technology companies to protect my personal data.
I believe technology has improved access to information and knowledge.
I am willing to sacrifice some privacy for the convenience and benefits that technology offers.
I feel overwhelmed by the constant advancements and updates in technology.
I believe technology has improved the quality of healthcare and medical treatments.
I am concerned about the negative effects of excessive technology use on mental health and well-being.
I enjoy experimenting with and customizing technological devices and settings.
I believe technology has made learning more engaging and accessible.
I feel dependent on technology for various aspects of my life.
I believe that artificial intelligence will significantly change the job market in the future.
I actively seek out information about the latest technological trends and developments.
I am skeptical about the accuracy and reliability of information provided by technology.
I believe technology has the potential to bridge the gap between different cultures and societies.
I am concerned about the environmental impact of technology production and e-waste.
I think technology has created a sense of social disconnection and decreased face-to-face interactions.
I am excited about the possibilities of virtual reality and augmented reality technologies.
I believe technology has improved transportation and made travel more convenient.
I am hesitant to try new technologies until they become widely adopted by others.
I believe technology has democratized access to entertainment and media.
I am concerned about the addictive nature of technology and its impact on productivity.
I believe technology has the potential to solve some of the world's most pressing challenges.
